Japanese text: （今日は、伊集院さんとデートだ）
English text: (I have a date with Ijuin-san today.)

Japanese text: （今日は、伊集院さんとデートだ）
English text: (Today, I have a date with Ijuin-san.)

Japanese text: 『伊集院さんのことについて知りたいんだけど。
English text: "I would like to know about Ijuin-san."

Japanese text: 『よし、次は、伊集院とだ。
English text: (Okay, next time, with Ijuin-san.)

Japanese text: 『しばらく伊集院さんと話し込んだ
English text: (I talked with Ijuin-san for a while.)

Japanese text: 『伊集院さんもいたのか。
English text: "Is Ijuin-san here too?"

Japanese text: 『あつ、今日は、伊集院さんの誕生日じゃないか。
English text: "Ah, today is Ijuin-san's birthday, isn't it?"

Japanese text: （もしかして、伊集院さんを知らず知らずのうちに傷つけてたのかな⋯。）
English text: (Maybe I've unknowingly hurt Ijuin-san...)

Japanese text: 『今日の自由行動は、この前の約束通り伊集院さんと―緒だ。
English text: "I'll spend today's free time with Ijuin-san, as promised."

Japanese text: 『まだ伊集院さんは、来ていないようだな。
English text: "I see Ijuin-san has not arrived yet."

Japanese text: （伊集院さんにプレゼントをもらえるなんて、おれは幸せ者だー！）
English text: (I'm so lucky to get a present from Ijuin-san!)

Japanese text: （神様、何とぞ伊集院さんと今以上に仲良くなれますように。）
English text: (God, please help me get to know Ijuin-san even better than I already do.)

Japanese text: （おつ、丁度いいところに伊集院さんが来たぞ。）
English text: (Oh, Ijuin-san arrived just in time.

Japanese text: （あつ、伊集院さん。）
English text: (Oh, Ijuin-san.)

English text: (I have a date with Asahina-san today.)

English text: (Today, I have a date with Asahina-san.)

English text: "I would like to know about Asahina-san."

English text: (Okay, next time, with Asahina-san.)

English text: (I talked with Asahina-san for a while.)

English text: "Is Asahina-san here too?"

English text: (I have a date with Yumi-san today.)

English text: (Today, I have a date with Yumi-san.)

Japanese text: 『優美さんのことについて知りたいんだけど。
English text: "I would like to know about Yumi-san."

English text: (Okay, next time, with Yumi-san.)

English text: (I talked with Yumi-san for a while.)

English text: "Is Yumi-san here too?"

Japanese text: 『あつ、今日は、優美さんの誕生日じゃないか。
English text: "Ah, today is Yumi-san's birthday, isn't it?"

Japanese text: （もしかして、優美さんを知らず知らずのうちに傷つけてたのかな⋯。）
English text: (Maybe I've unknowingly hurt Yumi-san...)

English text: "I'll spend today's free time with Yumi-san, as promised."

English text: (God, please help me get to know Yumi-san even better than I already do.)

Japanese text: 『無理だと思つていた第―志望だつたが、運良く合格することができた。
English text: It was my first choice and I thought it would be impossible, but luckily I was accepted.

Japanese text: 『俺の名前は<PNAME> <PSURNAME>。ここ、私立きらめき高校の新入生だ。
English text: My name is <PNAME> <PSURNAME>. I'm a freshman here at Kirameki Private High School.

Japanese text: 『最高の気分だぜ。密かに想つている、藤崎詩織と同じ学校に入学できたんだから。
English text: It's a great feeling. I've been admitted to the same school as Shiori Fujisaki, whom I secretly love.

Japanese text: 『実は⋯。彼女とは小学校からの幼なじみで、家も隣りどうしなんだけれど⋯
English text: Actually... I've known her since elementary school, and we live next door to each other, but...

Japanese text: 『俺と比べて、月とスッポン。だから、いまだに友達以上の関係には⋯。
English text: Compared to me, she's like the moon and I'm a turtle. So, we are still not more than friends...

Japanese text: Yoshio
English text: Yoshio

Japanese text: 「よう。何しけた面してんだよ。
English text: Hey. Why the gloomy face?

Japanese text: 『あ、あぁ⋯。別に⋯。（なれなれしい奴だなぁ⋯。）
English text: Ah, ah... Nothing... (He's so familiar...)

Japanese text: 「俺、早乙女好雄。これからよろしくな。お前は何ていうんだ？
English text: I'm Yoshio Saotome. Nice to meet you from now on. What's your name?

Japanese text: 『俺は、<PNAME> <PSURNAME>。こつちこそよろしくな。
English text: I'm <PNAME> <PSURNAME>. Nice to meet you too.

Japanese text: 「あつ、来たわよ。
English text: Oh, here it comes.

Japanese text: 「素敵～。
English text: Lovely~.

Japanese text: 「何だ？急に女子が騒ぎだしたぞ。
English text: What is it? Suddenly the girls are making a fuss.

Japanese text: Ijuin
English text: Ijuin

Japanese text: 「やあ、諸君。待たせたね。
English text: Hey, guys. Sorry to keep you waiting.

Japanese text: 「この僕の事を知らない者はいないと思うが⋯。僕が理事長の孫の伊集院レイだ。
English text: I don't think there's anyone who doesn't know me... I'm Rei Ijuin, the chairman's grandson.

Japanese text: 「同じクラスの男性諸君には悪いが⋯。ま、仲良くやつていこうじゃないか。
English text: I'm sorry to the men in the same class... Well, let's get along.

Japanese text: 「伊集院つて、あの金持ちのか⋯。嫌なクラスになつちまつたなぁ。
English text: Ijuin, that rich guy.... This class sucks now.

Japanese text: 『そ、そうだな⋯。
English text: Well, yeah...

Japanese text: （あつ、次は詩織の、自己紹介みたいだ。）
English text: (Oh, looks like Shiori is going to introduce herself next.)

Japanese text: 「みなさんはじめまして。名前は藤崎詩織です。
English text: Nice to meet you all. My name is Shiori Fujisaki.

Japanese text: 「趣味は音楽鑑賞で、クラシックとかを良く聴きます。みなさんこれから、よろしくお願いします。
English text: My hobby is listening to music and I often listen to classical music. I look forward to working with you all.

Japanese text: 「か、かわいいー。藤崎詩織ちゃんか⋯。このクラスでよかつたぜ。
English text: So cute! Shiori Fujisaki, huh.... I'm glad to be in this class.

Japanese text: （さつきは、嫌だつて言つてたくせに⋯。）
English text: (He was just saying he hated this class...)

Japanese text: 「あつ、今、お前の事見たぜ。あの娘知つてるのか？
English text: Hey, I just saw you. You know that girl?

Japanese text: 『知つてるも何も、俺の幼なじみだよ。
English text: Of course I know her, she's my childhood friend.

Japanese text: 「へぇ、そうなのか⋯。じゃあ、彼女の誕生日は？
English text: Oh, really... Then, what's her birthday?

Japanese text: 『<SHIORI_BIRTHDAY>。
English text: <SHIORI_BIRTHDAY>.

Japanese text: 「血液型は？
English text: What's her blood type?

Japanese text: 『Ｏ型。
English text: Type O.

Japanese text: 「趣味は？
English text: Hobbies?

Japanese text: 『音楽鑑賞つて、言つてたじゃないか。
English text: She said music appreciation.

Japanese text: 「あつ、そうか。スリーサイズは？
English text: Oh, right. What are her three sizes?

Japanese text: 『そんなの知るかよ。
English text: How would I know that?

Japanese text: 「よし、チェックだ。チェック。
English text: Alright, check. Check.

Japanese text: 『お、お前⋯。そのメモ帳、女の子の事ばつかりじゃないか⋯。
English text: Oh, you... Your notepad is all about girls...

Japanese text: 「ま、女の子の事で、知りたいことがあつたら、俺に連絡しな。力になるぜ。
English text: Well, if you want to know anything about girls, call me. I'll help you out.

Japanese text: 『そ、そうか⋯。ありがとう。
English text: Oh, okay... Thanks.

Japanese text: 「それよりも。お前、この高校の伝説知つてるか？
English text: More importantly, do you know the legend of this high school?

Japanese text: 『伝説？何それ？
English text: Legend? What's that?

Japanese text: 「ほら、そこの窓から、でつかい木が見えるだろ。
English text: Look, you can see a big tree from the window there.

Japanese text: 『ん？あぁ。
English text: Hmm? Oh.

Japanese text: 「あの木の下で、女の子に告白されると、永遠に幸せな関係になれるんだつてよ。
English text: It's said that if a girl confesses her love to you under that tree, you'll live happily ever after.

Japanese text: 『へぇ、そんな伝説があるのか⋯。
English text: Oh, I didn't know there was such a legend...

Japanese text: 「誰が言つたかしらねぇが、うらやましい話だな。
English text: I don't know who told you, but it's an enviable story.

Japanese text: 『伝説か⋯。そうだな、俺なら⋯
English text: Legend... Yeah, if it were me...

Japanese text: 『こうして、不安と期待の高校生活が始まつた⋯。
English text: Thus, my high school life began with anxiety and expectation...

Japanese text: （明日から何をしようかな？）
English text: (What should I do starting tomorrow?)

Japanese text: システム設定を変更します
English text: Change system settings

Japanese text: （今日は何をしようかな？）
English text: (What shall we do today?)

Japanese text: 『絵は、心が休まるぜ。（くーつ、しびれるセリフ。）
English text: Painting is restful for the soul. (What a numbing line.)

Japanese text: 「ビューティフル、素敵な絵ね。
English text: Beautiful, lovely picture.

Japanese text: 『あ、ありがとう。
English text: Oh, thank you.

Japanese text: 「そんなに上手なんだから、美術部に入部すればいいのに⋯。
English text: Since you're so good, you should join the art club...

Japanese text: 『絵は、たまに描くぐらいが、健康にいいんだよ。
English text: Painting is good for your health, even if you only draw once in a while.

Japanese text: 「へえ⋯絵つてたまに描くと健康にいいんだ。
English text: Well... drawing sometimes is good for your health.

Japanese text: 『そう、手のつぼを刺激されてこう⋯。運うつて。
English text: Yes, it stimulates the pressure points in your hand... It's uplifting.

Japanese text: 「あはははは⋯。私、片桐彩子つて言うの。あなたは⋯？
English text: Ha-ha-ha-ha... My name is Ayako Katagiri. And you are...?

Japanese text: 『あ、俺、<PNAME> <PSURNAME>。
English text: Oh, I'm <PNAME> <PSURNAME>.

Japanese text: 「気が向いたら美術室に遊びに来てよ。歓迎するわよ。
English text: Come visit the art room if you feel like it. You're welcome anytime.

Japanese text: 『ああ、気が向いたらね。
English text: Yeah, when I feel like it.

Japanese text: 「それじゃ、また。
English text: See you then.

Japanese text: 『面白い奴⋯。
English text: Interesting girl...

Japanese text: 「入部する部活を選択してください
English text: "Please select the club you would like to join"

Japanese text: 「美術部に入部した。
English text: "You joined the art club."

Japanese text: 「あつ、<PNAME>君ウェルカム。ようこそ美術部へ。
English text: Oh, <PNAME>-kun, welcome. Welcome to the Art Club.

Japanese text: 『片桐さん。これからよろしく。
English text: Katagiri-san, nice to meet you from now on.

Japanese text: 「こちらこそ。よろしくね。
English text: Nice to meet you too.

Japanese text: （放課後だ。あー眠いなぁ。）
English text: (It's after school. I'm so sleepy.)

Japanese text: ドン
English text: Don (sound effect)

Japanese text: 「あつ、ごめんなさい。
English text: Oh, sorry.

Japanese text: 『いや、いい⋯。
English text: No, it's okay...

Japanese text: 「あー、映画に遅れるぅ。
English text: Oh, I'm going to be late for the movie.

Japanese text: 『何だろ、今の娘？
English text: What was that about, that girl?

Japanese text: （あー、今日も疲れたな。急いで、家に帰ろう。）
English text: (Ah, I'm tired again today. Hurry up, let's go home.)

Japanese text: （あつ、詩織がいるぞ。）
English text: (Oh, there's Shiori.)

Japanese text: 『おーい、詩織。
English text: Hey, Shiori.

Japanese text: 「あつ、<PSURNAME>君。今帰り？
English text: Oh, <PSURNAME>-kun. Are you heading home now?

Japanese text: 「―緒に帰つて、友達に噂とかされると、恥ずかしいし⋯。
English text: If we go home together and our friends gossip, it would be embarrassing...

Japanese text: 『そ、そうだね。それじゃあ、お先に。
English text: Yes, that's right. Well, I'll go ahead then.

Japanese text: 「ごめんね。さよなら。
English text: Sorry. Bye.

Japanese text: （しょうがない。―人で帰るか。）
English text: (It can't be helped. I'll go home alone.)

Japanese text: 「さよなら。
English text: Goodbye.

Japanese text: 『今日は体育祭だ。どの競技に参加しようかな？
English text: Today is the Sports Festival. Which event should I participate in?

Japanese text: （今週は、バッチリ、予定どおりだぜ。
English text: This week, we're right on schedule.

Japanese text: 『ありがとう。
English text: Thank you.

Japanese text: （よし、ますますやる気が出てきたぞ。）
English text: Okay, I'm getting more and more motivated.

Japanese text: 「今日も頑張つて、ワンダフルな絵を描きましょう。
English text: Let's work hard today and paint a wonderful picture.

Japanese text: 『うん、頑張ろう。
English text: Yeah, let's do our best.

Japanese text: （誰に電話かけようかな？）
English text: (Who shall I call?)

Japanese text: Ｔｒｒｒｒ⋯
English text: Trrrrr ...

Japanese text: 「ハイ、早乙女です。
English text: "Hi, I am Saotome."

Japanese text: 『もしもし、<PNAME>ですけど。
English text: Hello, this is <PNAME>.

Japanese text: 「おつ、<PSURNAME>か。良くかけて来てくれたな。
English text: Oh, <PSURNAME>. I'm glad you called.

Japanese text: 『女の子の事なら任せておけつて、言つてたよな⋯。
English text: You said to leave things about girls to you...

Japanese text: 「もちろん。何について聞きたいんだ？
English text: Of course. What do you want to ask about?

Japanese text: 『女の子達が、俺をどう思つてるか知りたいんだ。
English text: I want to know what the girls think of me.

Japanese text: 「評価か⋯。ちょつと待つてくれよ。
English text: Their opinion, huh... Wait a moment.

Japanese text: 「女の子の、お前に対する評価は⋯。
English text: The girls' evaluation of you is...

Japanese text: 「こんなとこだな。
English text: This is what it is.

Japanese text: （女の子の情報でも聞いてみようかな）
English text: (Maybe I should ask for some info on the girls)

Japanese text: 「あぁ、いいぜ。ちょつと待つてくれよ。
English text: Sure, just wait a moment.

Japanese text: 「片桐、片桐‥‥と。
English text: Katagiri, Katagiri...

Japanese text: 「あつたあつた。耳かつぽじつてよく聞けよ。
English text: Got it. Listen up carefully.

Japanese text: 「つて、とこだな。
English text: So, here's the info.

Japanese text: 『サンキュー。いつも悪いな。
English text: Thanks. Sorry to trouble you.

Japanese text: 「なーに、いいつてことよ。女の子の情報なら俺に任せてくれよ。
English text: No problem. Leave the info on girls to me.

Japanese text: ガチャ
English text: *click*

Japanese text: （さて、昼飯だ。早く学食に行かないと⋯。）
English text: (Now, lunch. I have to go to the cafeteria soon...)

Japanese text: 「<PSURNAME>君。
English text: "<PNAME>-kun."

Japanese text: 『あつ、虹野さん。
English text: "Ah, Nijino-san."

Japanese text: 「お昼ご飯どうするの？
English text: "What are you going to do for lunch?"

Japanese text: 『これから、学食に行こうと思つて。
English text: "I was about to go to the cafeteria."

Japanese text: 「それなら、―緒にお弁当食べない？
English text: "Then - why don't you eat lunch with me?"

Japanese text: 『えつ、お弁当？
English text: "Etsu, bento?"

Japanese text: 「この前喜んでもらえたから、つい⋯。迷惑だつた？
English text: "I was pleased with you the other day, so I just did... Did I bother you?"

Japanese text: 『い、いや、全然。虹野さんの料理なら、いつでも大歓迎だよ。
English text: "No, no, not at all. If it's Nijino-san's cooking, you're always welcome."

Japanese text: 「良かつた⋯。今日は天気もいいから、外で―緒に食べない？
English text: "Good... It's a nice day, so why don't we eat outside together?"

Japanese text: 『別にいいよ。じゃあ、中庭に行こうか。
English text: "I don't mind. Well, let's go to the courtyard."

Japanese text: 「うん。行きましょう。
English text: "Yeah. Let's go. Let's go."

Japanese text: 「はい、どうぞ。味の保証はしないけど⋯。
English text: "Here you go. I don't guarantee the taste, but..."

Japanese text: 『それじゃ、遠慮しないで、いただきます。
English text: "Well, then, don't be shy, I'll take it."

Japanese text: 「うふふ、おいしい？
English text: "Mmmmmm, delicious?"

Japanese text: 『モグモグ、すごくおいしいよ。モグモグ。
English text: "Mogmog, it's so good. Mogumogu."

Japanese text: 「良かつた⋯。
English text: "It was good..."

Japanese text: 『こんなおいしい手作りのお弁当が食べれて俺は幸せ者だ。
English text: "I am a lucky man to be able to eat such a delicious homemade lunch."

Japanese text: 「ハイ、早乙女です。
English text: "Hi, I am Saotome."

Japanese text: 「あつ、<PNAME>さん。優美に、何か用。
English text: "Ah, <PSURNAME>. Yumi, what can I do for you?"

Japanese text: デートする日を選んで下さい
English text: Pick the date you want to date.

Japanese text: デートする場所を選んで下さい
English text: Pick a place to date.

Japanese text: 「うん、いいよ。
English text: "Yeah, okay."

Japanese text: 「うん、分かつた。約束破つたら、針千本飲ますからね。
English text: "Yes, I get it. If you break your promise, I'll drink a thousand needles."

Japanese text: 『ははは⋯、忘れないよ。それじゃ、好雄によろしく。
English text: "Haha... I won't forget you. Well then, give my best regards to Yoshio."

Japanese text: Shiori
English text: Fujisaki
"June 1."

Japanese text: 『Ａ型。
English text: "Type A."

Japanese text: 今月／来月の予定と実績
English text: Schedule and results for this month/next month

Japanese text: 『詩織のことについて知りたいんだけど。
English text: "I would like to know about the poetry."

Japanese text: 「藤崎、藤崎‥‥と。
English text: "Fujisaki, Fujisaki ... hmmm."

Japanese text: （ああ、読書は楽しいなあ。なんて、俺つて勉強家なんだろう。）
English text: (Ah, reading is so much fun. What a studious person I am!)

Japanese text: 「あの⋯。
English text: "You know..."

Japanese text: 「ハンカチが落ちてますよ。
English text: "Your handkerchief is down."

Japanese text: 『え⋯。あ、ありがとう。いつの間に落ちたんだろう。
English text: "Eh... Oh, thank you. I wonder when it fell off."

Japanese text: 「クスッ⋯。随分、熱心に読んでいたのですね。
English text: "Couscous... You have been reading this book with a lot of enthusiasm, haven't you?"

Japanese text: 『ほら、僕つて好きなことに熱中するタイプだから。ははは⋯。
English text: "You see, I'm the type of person who is passionate about what I like. Ha-ha-ha..."

Japanese text: 「私も本を読みだすと、すぐ熱中してしまうんですよ。
English text: "When I start reading a book, I too get easily absorbed in it."

Japanese text: 『へー、そうなんだ。
English text: "Heh, I see."

Japanese text: 「あつ、もう行かなきゃ。
